name: Genesect
flavorText:
Over 300 million years ago, it was feared
as the strongest of hunters.
It has been modified by Team Plasma.
formDescription: Form changes to match Genesect's held Drive.  The only differences are the color of its weapon and techno blast's type.

previous.name: Meloetta
previous.flavorText:
Its melodies are sung with a special vocalization
method that can control the feelings of those who
hear it.
previous.formDescription: Forms have different stats and types.  Meloetta changes form upon using relic song in battle, and reverts to Aria Forme outside of battle.

pokemon.name: Genesect
pokemon.flavorText:
Over 300 million years ago, it was feared
as the strongest of hunters.
It has been modified by Team Plasma.
pokemon.formDescription: Form changes to match Genesect's held Drive.  The only differences are the color of its weapon and techno blast's type.
